title: 14 week suspension for unfair cause
body: i was firing back at trolls who were griefing and flaming, why did i get a 14 day suspension ??????

replies.body: You have answered your own question. It is against the rules to "fire back" against anyone for anything.

>i was firing back at trolls

First rule of the internet.
Seriously. At what point did "don't feed the trolls" become forgotten?
Individuals usually forget it around the same time that they have the epiphany "hey, maybe I should chase {{champion:27}} !"
Joining the flaming and griefing does not make you superior to them, it just adds you to the list of trash being taken out.
Because in firing back at griefers and flamers, you became a griefer and a flamer yourself.

> i was firing back

They flame, you add to it. Flaming someone who flames you does not reduce the tension/toxicity. Flaming a flamer only makes the game now have more flamers.
Griefing is often misunderstood or not easy to detect. You firing back is easy to detect, and rito is not okay with it.
